SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.rmi

Class ServerRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.rmi.ServerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameActions, HeartBeatListener, VirtualServer, Remote
public class ServerRMI extends Object implements VirtualServer
ServerRMI is the remote reference for the client as if they called them locally.
